definition: a few years/several years/how many years
the last few years/last several years/recent years

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他專心一志地做生意，在幾年中就賺到許多錢。

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 這是我這幾年來第一次有這樣的感受。

sentences.english: Grocery stores, for example, will have pricing power they haven't experienced in years.
sentences.chinese: 例如百貨店，就擁有幾年前沒有的價格上的優勢。

sentences.english: I lived in Asia for a few years.
Only 8 of the 58 present at the uncovering of the tomb died within a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 58人中只有8人在挖墓後的十幾年內死亡。

sentences.english: Azar, who learned the trick years ago from another clerk.
sentences.chinese: 他幾年前從另一個職員那學來了這一招。

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年的另一個主要趨勢是向多核芯片的過渡。

sentences.english: Similarly a few years know that we are facing employment problems.
sentences.chinese: 同理可知再過幾年我們所面臨的就業問題。

sentences.english: In the past few years, however, there has been an upsurge of research into the female sexual response.
sentences.chinese: 但在過去的幾年裏，對女性性反應的研究驟然升溫。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: in later years, they'd come and go.
sentences.chinese: 後來幾年，就算有朋友，也都來去匆匆。

sentences.english: In the past year or so the Radicals have begun to regroup.
sentences.chinese: 過去的幾年激進派已經開始重組。

sentences.english: In the first few years after I moved there, lotus flowers continued to blossom on the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 剛搬來的幾年，池塘裏還有荷花。

sentences.english: The occupation of genetic engineer took a few more years to be named, this time by Poul Anderson.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後這個詞彙才被保羅安德森應用於科學當中。

sentences.english: The importance and vulnerability of seed banks have become apparent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 種子銀行的重要性和脆弱性近幾年來已很明顯。

sentences.english: It is years since I enjoyed myself so much.
sentences.chinese: 我好幾年沒玩得這樣痛快了。

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
